doc.title: Route 66
doc.plot: Route 66 is the story of Mulligan, a giant golf ball statue on the side of legendary Route 66. When Betty, a giant blueberry who hovers above a produce stand on the other side of the street, is carted off one day, Mulligan steps down off his pedestal and sets off to find the love of his life. The movie was written by Conrad Vernon and Harlan Williams.
